p: The Toolik project (Table 1) is located at the University of Alaska’s Toolik Field Station (TFS) some 125 km inland from the Arctic Ocean. The Long Term Ecological Research (LTER) 1 and related projects at this site have collected data on a wide variety of variables since 1975 (Hobbie 2014). The long-term research site in the Zackenberg Valley (Table 1) is located on the coast of northeast Greenland where environmental and ecological data have been collected since 1995 (National Environmental Research Institute, Aarhus University 2).
